item.description:
Once again, let's meetup for the traditional bi-monthly Sunday Brunch at The Gaslight in the South End. The ambience is authentic Parisian, the food is delicious (and oh so inexpensive ($9.95 includes a choice of 3 appetizers, 2 juices, coffee or tea and a sweet ala Julia Child! (taxes and tips additional)) We always have a fun time at this event and everyone goes home with a smile.

And again, we have the opportunity to visit the famous SOWA markets where 44 vendors of fresh, local fruits & veggies, preserves, quality arts & crafts, jewlery, antiques, clothing, etc will be selling their wares. It's a "2fer".
item.name: Sunday Brunch anyone?
